duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement core talent processes and programs for 2,000+ global employees, including goal setting, performance management, talent review, and succession planning.
Partner with HRBPs on org-level strategies and company-wide programs based on data and insights.
Build and lead talent review and succession planning processes to ensure a strong leadership bench and talent pipelines.
Design assessment frameworks, career frameworks, and leadership assessments to meet business needs over time.
Deliver robust communications and change plans to drive adoption and engagement of talent management programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR Management or related field (Master's preferred)
